member_organisations: NCZI has no members, only branch office in Slovak republic.
eu_initiatives: - activities discussed and coordinated in eHealth Network - cross border transfer of patient data, semantic interoperability, legislation with regards of cross border transfer of patient data.
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
goals__remit:
NCZI is responsible for: 
- eHealth activitie on the national level in Slovak republic, 
- cross - border eHealth activities, 
- health indicators and health statistics reporting to slovak Ministry of health, 
- medicine library activities in Slovak republic
relevant_communication:
- publication activities on the national level in the area of health statical indicators, 
- publication of standards for national eHealth IT systems, 
- organisation of specialized educational workshops for eHealth stakeholders on the national level,
legal_status: organisation financed from the contribution from state budget
